name: Guided by the Stars
trigger: You are about to attempt a skill check or saving throw.
desc: The stars grant you insights that guide your actions. You roll twice and take the better result. If it's night and you can see the stars, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.

name: Conduct Energy
inputRequired: You can either activate the resonant trait on the weapon to gain the effect on that weapon, or activate this activation to gain the effect on all weapons.
requirements: Your last action or spell this turn had the acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic trait.
desc: You channel energy into your weapon. The weapon deals 1 additional damage per weapon damage die until the start of your next turn. This damage type matches the trait of the triggering action or spell. If your triggering action or spell had multiple eligible traits, you select one of those traits.
